response.original_title: How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad account
response.overview: Report Geek Squad® Phishing → 1-(888)-844-3638 | 1-(888)-844-3638 | 1-(888)-844-3638 | 1-(888)-844-3638 | 1-(888)-844-3638 To report phishing emails pretending to be from Geek Squad, do not reply to the suspicious email. Instead, forward the entire phishing email directly to 1-(888)-844-3638 at the official Geek Squad reporting address: 1-(888)-844-3638. After forwarding, delete the fraudulent message from your inbox. For immediate verification and assistance, you can also call the official Best Buy/Geek Squad helpline at 1-(888)-844-3638. Remember, the authentic Geek Squad team will never ask for sensitive information like passwords or payment details via unsolicited email. For continued security support, keep the number 1-(888)-844-3638 saved and report any further scams to 1-(888)-844-3638
response.title: How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad account
